actionRequired.subject: RE: Dinner Monday, April 23
actionRequired.actionRequired: Confirm attendance at dinner with Michael Holthouse and Matt Khourie on April 23rd at Capital Grille.

actionRequired.subject: Houston Flood Relief Effort
actionRequired.actionRequired: Consider donating to Houston flood relief efforts. Enron will match employee contributions dollar for dollar.

actionRequired.subject: My Concerns
actionRequired.actionRequired: Review and potentially address concerns raised by Denise Soo regarding Enron's contractor hiring practices.

actionRequired.subject: Moving forward: URGENT, URGENT.
actionRequired.actionRequired: Review and discuss Partha Ghosh's proposal for moving forward with the ATT alliance, including fee structure and milestones.

summaryItems.subject: KUDLOW'S TAKE -- National Review Online Financial -- September 7,
summaryItems.keyDetails: Analysis of the current economic climate and stock market performance, suggesting that Washington needs to implement more stimulative policies to promote economic recovery.

summaryItems.subject: Smith Graham
summaryItems.keyDetails: Notification that the Enron Cash Balance Plan has retained Smith Graham to manage $15 million of pension assets.

summaryItems.subject: Weekend Outage Report for 10-5-01 through 10-7-01
summaryItems.keyDetails: Report detailing scheduled system outages for various Enron systems over the weekend of October 5th to 7th.

summaryItems.subject: FW: Marketing Off-site
summaryItems.keyDetails: Expression of gratitude for Jeff Skilling's participation in the Marketing off-site and his vision for the department's role.

summaryItems.subject: eSpeak Statistics
summaryItems.keyDetails: Update on the high participation and readership statistics for Jeff Skilling's recent eSpeak session.
